@@ -156,0 +156,8 @@
+// No direct support for 8-byte xchg; emulate using cmpxchg.
+template<>
+struct Atomic::PlatformXchg<8> : Atomic::XchgUsingCmpxchg<8> {};

+template<>
+struct Atomic::PlatformAdd<8> : Atomic::AddUsingCmpxchg<8> {};
